title: Event Scrapers
subtitle: Manage automated event data synchronization from external sources
alertDescription: Event scrapers automatically sync events from external sources weekly. You can manually trigger syncing here. Scraped events will be automatically deduplicated and marked with their source
automaticSyncingDesc: Scrapers run automatically every week to keep events up-to-date
deduplicationDesc: Events are matched by external ID to prevent duplicates. Existing events are updated with latest information
adminProtectionDesc: Events manually modified by admins won't be overwritten during automatic syncs
visibilityControlDesc: Use the "Scraped Events" toggle in Settings to show/hide all scraped events globally
allSourcesDescription: Sync events from all available sources (Abu Dhabi Media Office + ADNEC)
abuDhabiDescription: Syncs events from Abu Dhabi Media Office events calendar
adnecDescription: Syncs exhibitions and conferences from ADNEC Centre Abu Dhabi
